channel.title: Sandy is a bitch
channel.description:
So yeah, in case you haven't heard, Hurricane Sandy pretty much decimated the east coast. The town I live in (Point Pleasant) was broadcast on the news in a lot of places and the boardwalks were destroyed, which is probably what a lot of people have seen. I still have no power or internet (charging my phone in a car. Yay) which is why I haven't been posting.
So aside from that, hows everyone been? I know these kinds of topics typically aren't posted, but hey, lets get some general discussion going ;)

item.title: Sandy is a bitch
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

I didn’t mean to offend anyone who has been effected by this storm. As I told rip4d in a PM, everyone is acting like this is the worst storm in history (blowing it out of proportion). People lose their houses/loved ones everyday from storms but they receive no recognition.

Sorry, again.

Read full topic

item.title: Sandy is a bitch
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:38, topic:466144”][quote author=Krackkid link=topic=577242.msg4154416#msg4154416 date=1352601555]
rip the northern East Coast you mean, Florida has horrible hurricanes ever few years that cause damages like that.
[/quote]Yeah, but you guys know how to handle it well. Up here its difficult because we aren’t prepared for these damages in any way. And a lot of the damage wasn’t even from the wind directly, it was just the massive flooding because of how it was the ‘perfect storm’.[/quote]
True… Kinda like if it snowed here really hard, we would all be loveed.

EDIT: AHAHAHA I love you Mopar auto correct <3

Read full topic

item.title: Sandy is a bitch
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:35, topic:466144”]rip the northern East Coast you mean, Florida has horrible hurricanes ever few years that cause damages like that.[/quote]Yeah, but you guys know how to handle it well. Up here its difficult because we aren’t prepared for these damages in any way. And a lot of the damage wasn’t even from the wind directly, it was just the massive flooding because of how it was the ‘perfect storm’.

Fails:

@rip4d; That sucks. So, instead of wasting your time on Mopar, you may want to consider focusing on getting your house all dolled up again.

Meh, you’re right, sorry about raging at you. It just sucks. But I’ll continue to waste time on Mopar, as we already have a general contractor helping us out. Hopefully the first floor is rebuilt and the house can be lived in again by Christmas.

Read full topic

item.title: Sandy is a bitch
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:32, topic:466144”]As if we haven’t had any devastating hurricanes in the past.[/quote]This was the worst storm most of the East Cost has seen, EVER. My house flooded because of a creek flooding over from the storm surge, and the last time it flooded was in 1902, 110 years ago. This was the worst thing to happen to the east coast and flooded my first floor. I lost nearly all of my belongings, pictures, furniture, etc, and it sucked. Sure, there have been storms that were bad elsewhere, but you can grow the hell up and ignore this if you really want to. Its not hard to control yourself and stop from posting, or even viewing this topic. You weren’t forced to click on this, nor were you forced to reply, you did it by your own will. If you’re sick of seeing something, just disregard it and move on.

Read full topic
